caption.p: Derivative chromatogram created using the gas chromatograph/surface acoustic wave (SAW) electronic nose system. (A) Control, (B) Cordyceps coffee, and (C) 30% mixture of Cordyceps mushroom ( Cordyceps militaris). The X-axis stands for the retention time for 20 s and the Y-axis stands for the concentration expressed in counts (cts/s) of the frequency changes obtained by the SAW single sensor.
